welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Four Square Mile, a charming city known for its rich history and welcoming community. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and explore all the wonderful experiences our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Denver International Airport, housing check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, primarily serving United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, primarily serving Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, primarily serving Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport provides exclusive services for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
